about_the_game:
Secret Agent No. 6 is an unreleased first-person shooter straight from the 90s. Step in the shoes of a legendary secret agent, codename 'SIX', and bring down a dangerous terrorist organization. Find out what they are planning, where to find them, and how to stop them. What might seem like an ordinary game, takes a dark turn when something else is present.

The game provides a surreal experience that may have upsetting themes. While resembling a simple 90s-shooter, it is much more. Please play at your discretion.

Unique missions

Secret Agent No. 6 brings you to various worldwide locations. The game is divided into multiple chapters. Chapters contain several unique missions, each requiring its own strategy.

After completing a mission, a grade reflects how the mission went. The mission can be replayed at any time on various difficulties. Can you complete each mission with an A+ rating?

Custom loadouts

There are over 30+ unlockable equipment in the game. Each equipment is unique, ranging from weaponry to explosives, to crazy weirdness. Because of this, each weapon may open up a unique strategy.

For each mission, you are allowed to bring two unique equipment. As the difficulty may rise throughout the game, different loadout combinations shall be essential.

Stealth or guns-blazing.

Secret Agent No. 6 introduces various enemy types. These enemies may range from simple guards to heavily armed machine gunners. Each enemy may require a different strategy. Combined with the unique variety of missions, strategies may range from stealth to full-on guns-blazing.

As the d!fficulty may rise, it may be important to el!minate enemies before they are given the chance to fight back. $tay quiet, distract enemIes, destr0y cameras, and h!de wHen ncessAry.

Challenges and cheat codes.

After completing the game, a set of challenges are unlocked. Completing challenges may unlock cheat codes that can freely be u$ed During miss!0nS.

content_descriptors.notes: Although the game is of low quality, the content may be upsetting. The game features psychological horror elements. This pairs with blood, gore, and ideas of (self)mutilation. The game may also show minor jumpscares, loud noises and flashing images.

name: Secret Agent No. 6

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: An unreleased 90s first-person shooter, remastered for PC. Discover various worldwide locations, enemies, weapons, and more. It looks fine on the surface.
